synopsis.text: The creators of The World, as a token of appreciation for the heroes of the .hack//Sign and .hack game series, have established a hidden hot springs retreat known as the Twilight Hot Springs. The race is on for beloved characters like Tsukasa, Mimiru, BlackRose, Kite, and others to find this elusive sanctuary and enjoy some much-needed relaxation. However, the quest is not without its challenges, as mysterious player murders plague the game and the only clue to unraveling the mystery and locating the hot springs is the cryptic word "GIFT." Who will find the hot springs first and put an end to the player killings? The adventure begins in this thrilling and engaging anime.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
